components.html:
<div class="dnd_module">
<style>
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc { background:#fff; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea { position:relative; margin-bottom:40px; padding:0 64px 0 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .sort { position:relative; width:140px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea select#selArray { display:block; overflow:hidden; position:relative; height:28px; line-height:28px; width:100%; padding:0px 26px 0 8px; font-weight:normal; font-size:12px; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap; color:#5d5d5d; border:1px solid #dedfe2; box-sizing:border-box; background:#fff url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/layout/form/bg_select.gif') no-repeat 100% 0; background-size:20px auto; }

.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList { position:relative; width:100%; padding:20px 16px 0; box-sizing:border-box; background-color:#fff; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList h2 { overflow:hidden; margin:0 0 15px; font-size:18px; line-height:27px; color:#000; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList img { max-width:100%; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList li { vertical-align:top; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .prdList:after { content:''; display:block; clear:both; }

.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail { position:relative; overflow:hidden; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail a { display:block; position:relative; font-size:0; background:#f6f6f8; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail a img { max-width:100%; max-height:100%; width:100%; height:auto; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail .prdIcon { position:absolute; top:0; left:0; width:100%; height:100%; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-size:30% auto; } /* ??????????????? */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail .icon { position:absolute; bottom:0; left:0; font-size:0; white-space:normal; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail .icon img { margin:0 4px 0 0; }

.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description { min-height:102px; padding:7px 20px 20px 0; text-align:left; box-sizing:border-box; word-break:break-all; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .name { display:block; display:-webkit-box; overflow:hidden; word-wrap:break-word; max-height:36px; font-weight:normal; line-height:18px; text-overflow:ellipsis; -webkit-line-clamp:2; -webkit-box-orient:vertical; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .name a { display:block; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .name a:hover { text-decoration:none; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .name a,
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .name a > span { font-size:12px; line-height:18px; color:#000; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .price { font-size:12px; color:#000; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .strike,
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .mPriceStrike { color:#999; } /* 할인 전 가격 */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .spec .mileage { display:inline-block; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description li.cart { }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .color { overflow:hidden; margin:0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .color .chips { float:left; width:12px; height:10px; margin:0 2px 2px 0; font-size:0; line-height:0; border:1px solid #e3e3e3; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .likeButton button { border:0; background:none; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .likeButton button strong { margin:0 0 0 3px; font-size:11px; line-height:20px; color:#757575; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .likeButton.selected button strong { line-height:20px; color:#2e2e2e; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .icon { display:block; margin:17px 0 0 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .icon img { margin:2px 2px 0 0; vertical-align:middle; }

/*
https://jira.simplexi.com/browse/ECQAINT-30239
비교기능을 사용하지 않음.
*/
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .chk { display: none; }

.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList.typeThumb h2 { padding:0 100px 0 0;  }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList.typeThumb .prdList { display:-webkit-flex; display:-ms-flex; display:flex; -ms-flex-wrap:wrap; -webkit-flex-wrap:wrap; flex-wrap:wrap; margin:0 0 0 -10px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList.typeThumb .prdList > li { float:left; -webkit-flex-basis:50%; -ms-flex-basis:50%; flex-basis:50%; width:50%; box-sizing:border-box; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList.typeThumb .prdList > li > .inner { padding-left:10px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList.typeThumb .prdList.small > li { -webkit-flex-basis:33.3%; -ms-flex-basis:33.3%; flex-basis:33.3%; width:33.3%; }

/* 정렬 버튼 */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting { position:absolute; right:0; top:0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button { overflow:hidden; position:relative; float:left; width:32px; height:28px; box-sizing:border-box; font-size:1px; line-height:0; color:transparent; background:#ededed; text-indent:150%; white-space:nowrap; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button.selected { border:1px solid #000; background:#fff; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button:before { content:''; position:absolute; left:50%; top:50%; width:12px; height:12px; margin:-6px 0 0 -6px; background:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/sfix_btn_sorting.png') no-repeat 0 0; background-size:100px auto; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button.bigView:before { background-position:0 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button.bigView.selected:before { background-position:0 -50px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button.smallView:before { background-position:-50px 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button.smallView.selected:before { background-position:-50px -50px; }

/* paginate */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList { max-width:360px; margin:-3px auto 0; padding:0 0 48px; text-align:center; background:#fff; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList [class*='btn'] { display:inline-block; overflow:hidden; position:relative; width:30px; height:30px; font-size:1px; line-height:0; color:transparent; border:1px solid #dedfe2; vertical-align:top; text-indent:150%; white-space:nowrap; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList [class*='btn']:before { content:''; position:absolute; left:50%; top:50%; width:8px; height:13px; margin:-6px 0 0 -4px; background:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/sfix_btn_paginate.png') no-repeat 0 0; background-size:100px auto; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .btnNext:before { background-position:-50px 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page { display:inline-block; height:32px; vertical-align:top; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page:after { content:''; display:block; clear:both; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page li { float:left; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page li a { display:inline-block; margin:0 18px; font-size:15px; line-height:32px; color:#999; text-decoration:none; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page .other { }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page .this { font-weight:bold; color:#000; }

/* 할인 기간 */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .discountPeriod { display:inline-block; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod { display:none; border:1px solid #565960; background:#fff; -webkit-box-shadow:3px 3px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); -moz-box-shadow:3px 3px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);box-shadow:3px 3px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod strong.title { display:block; margin:0 0 12px; padding:0 35px 0 0; font-weight:bold; color:#2e2e2e; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod strong.title img { vertical-align:middle; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod .content p { margin:2px 0 0; font-size:11px; line-height:16px; color:#757575; letter-spacing:-1px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod .content p strong { font-weight:normal; font-size:12px; color:#2e2e2e; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod .content p strong span { font-size:11px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod .edge { display:none; }

/* 구매조건에 따라 배송비 차등부과 layer */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .shippingFee .ec-base-tooltip .btnTooltip { position: static; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .shippingFee .ec-base-tooltip .btnTooltip .differentialShipping .close a {text-indent: 150%;}
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .shippingFee .ec-base-tooltip .btnTooltip .differentialShipping {  left: 0;  right: 0;  margin: 3px auto 0; width: 88%;  }

/* shopQ start*/
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .xans-product-searchdata.typeList { border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e9f2; margin: 10px 0 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc #ec-product-searchdata-form { display:block !important; }
/* search */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .searchForm .search .btnDelete {  right: 1px;top: 1px;  width: 34px; height: 34px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .searchForm .search [class*="btn"] { overflow: hidden; position: absolute; font-size: 1px; line-height: 0; color: transparent; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .searchForm .search [class*="btn"]:before {  content: ''; position: absolute; background-image: url(//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/sfix_search_form.png);  background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: 150px 25px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .searchForm .search .btnDelete:before { right: 11px; top: 11px;  width: 12px;  height: 12px;  background-position: -100px 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .shopQShow .searchForm .search .btnDelete {  right: 35px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .searchForm .search .btnResearch { width: 34px; height: 34px; border-left: 1px solid #d8d8d8;  font-size: 1px;line-height: 0; top: 1px;  right: 1px;  background: url(//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/sfix_search_form.png) 11px 11px no-repeat; background-size: 150px 25px; }
/* 상세검색 레이어 팝업(팝업형) */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .xans-product-searchdata .searchCondition { display:none; z-index:301; overflow-y:auto; max-width:900px; margin: 0 auto;  position:fixed; top:0; left:0; right:0; bottom:0; background:#fff; -webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .xans-product-searchdata .searchCondition h2 { padding: 16px 50px 16px 16px; font-size: 15px; line-height: 18px; font-weight: bold; background: #fff; color: #000; }

component.source:
<div class="dnd_module">
<style>
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc { background:#fff; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea { position:relative; margin-bottom:40px; padding:0 64px 0 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .sort { position:relative; width:140px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea select#selArray { display:block; overflow:hidden; position:relative; height:28px; line-height:28px; width:100%; padding:0px 26px 0 8px; font-weight:normal; font-size:12px; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap; color:#5d5d5d; border:1px solid #dedfe2; box-sizing:border-box; background:#fff url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/layout/form/bg_select.gif') no-repeat 100% 0; background-size:20px auto; }

.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList { position:relative; width:100%; padding:20px 16px 0; box-sizing:border-box; background-color:#fff; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList h2 { overflow:hidden; margin:0 0 15px; font-size:18px; line-height:27px; color:#000; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList img { max-width:100%; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList li { vertical-align:top; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .prdList:after { content:''; display:block; clear:both; }

.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail { position:relative; overflow:hidden; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail a { display:block; position:relative; font-size:0; background:#f6f6f8; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail a img { max-width:100%; max-height:100%; width:100%; height:auto; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail .prdIcon { position:absolute; top:0; left:0; width:100%; height:100%; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-size:30% auto; } /* ??????????????? */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail .icon { position:absolute; bottom:0; left:0; font-size:0; white-space:normal; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .thumbnail .icon img { margin:0 4px 0 0; }

.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description { min-height:102px; padding:7px 20px 20px 0; text-align:left; box-sizing:border-box; word-break:break-all; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .name { display:block; display:-webkit-box; overflow:hidden; word-wrap:break-word; max-height:36px; font-weight:normal; line-height:18px; text-overflow:ellipsis; -webkit-line-clamp:2; -webkit-box-orient:vertical; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .name a { display:block; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .name a:hover { text-decoration:none; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .name a,
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .name a > span { font-size:12px; line-height:18px; color:#000; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .price { font-size:12px; color:#000; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .strike,
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .mPriceStrike { color:#999; } /* 할인 전 가격 */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .spec .mileage { display:inline-block; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description li.cart { }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .color { overflow:hidden; margin:0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .color .chips { float:left; width:12px; height:10px; margin:0 2px 2px 0; font-size:0; line-height:0; border:1px solid #e3e3e3; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .likeButton button { border:0; background:none; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .likeButton button strong { margin:0 0 0 3px; font-size:11px; line-height:20px; color:#757575; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .likeButton.selected button strong { line-height:20px; color:#2e2e2e; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .icon { display:block; margin:17px 0 0 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .icon img { margin:2px 2px 0 0; vertical-align:middle; }

/*
https://jira.simplexi.com/browse/ECQAINT-30239
비교기능을 사용하지 않음.
*/
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList .description .chk { display: none; }

.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList.typeThumb h2 { padding:0 100px 0 0;  }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList.typeThumb .prdList { display:-webkit-flex; display:-ms-flex; display:flex; -ms-flex-wrap:wrap; -webkit-flex-wrap:wrap; flex-wrap:wrap; margin:0 0 0 -10px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList.typeThumb .prdList > li { float:left; -webkit-flex-basis:50%; -ms-flex-basis:50%; flex-basis:50%; width:50%; box-sizing:border-box; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList.typeThumb .prdList > li > .inner { padding-left:10px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productList.typeThumb .prdList.small > li { -webkit-flex-basis:33.3%; -ms-flex-basis:33.3%; flex-basis:33.3%; width:33.3%; }

/* 정렬 버튼 */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting { position:absolute; right:0; top:0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button { overflow:hidden; position:relative; float:left; width:32px; height:28px; box-sizing:border-box; font-size:1px; line-height:0; color:transparent; background:#ededed; text-indent:150%; white-space:nowrap; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button.selected { border:1px solid #000; background:#fff; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button:before { content:''; position:absolute; left:50%; top:50%; width:12px; height:12px; margin:-6px 0 0 -6px; background:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/sfix_btn_sorting.png') no-repeat 0 0; background-size:100px auto; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button.bigView:before { background-position:0 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button.bigView.selected:before { background-position:0 -50px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button.smallView:before { background-position:-50px 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .sortingArea .btnSorting button.smallView.selected:before { background-position:-50px -50px; }

/* paginate */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList { max-width:360px; margin:-3px auto 0; padding:0 0 48px; text-align:center; background:#fff; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList [class*='btn'] { display:inline-block; overflow:hidden; position:relative; width:30px; height:30px; font-size:1px; line-height:0; color:transparent; border:1px solid #dedfe2; vertical-align:top; text-indent:150%; white-space:nowrap; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList [class*='btn']:before { content:''; position:absolute; left:50%; top:50%; width:8px; height:13px; margin:-6px 0 0 -4px; background:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/sfix_btn_paginate.png') no-repeat 0 0; background-size:100px auto; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .btnNext:before { background-position:-50px 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page { display:inline-block; height:32px; vertical-align:top; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page:after { content:''; display:block; clear:both; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page li { float:left; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page li a { display:inline-block; margin:0 18px; font-size:15px; line-height:32px; color:#999; text-decoration:none; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page .other { }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .productPaginate.typeList .page .this { font-weight:bold; color:#000; }

/* 할인 기간 */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .discountPeriod { display:inline-block; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod { display:none; border:1px solid #565960; background:#fff; -webkit-box-shadow:3px 3px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); -moz-box-shadow:3px 3px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);box-shadow:3px 3px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod strong.title { display:block; margin:0 0 12px; padding:0 35px 0 0; font-weight:bold; color:#2e2e2e; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod strong.title img { vertical-align:middle; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod .content p { margin:2px 0 0; font-size:11px; line-height:16px; color:#757575; letter-spacing:-1px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod .content p strong { font-weight:normal; font-size:12px; color:#2e2e2e; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod .content p strong span { font-size:11px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .layerDiscountPeriod .edge { display:none; }

/* 구매조건에 따라 배송비 차등부과 layer */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .shippingFee .ec-base-tooltip .btnTooltip { position: static; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .shippingFee .ec-base-tooltip .btnTooltip .differentialShipping .close a {text-indent: 150%;}
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .shippingFee .ec-base-tooltip .btnTooltip .differentialShipping {  left: 0;  right: 0;  margin: 3px auto 0; width: 88%;  }

/* shopQ start*/
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .xans-product-searchdata.typeList { border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e9f2; margin: 10px 0 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc #ec-product-searchdata-form { display:block !important; }
/* search */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .searchForm .search .btnDelete {  right: 1px;top: 1px;  width: 34px; height: 34px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .searchForm .search [class*="btn"] { overflow: hidden; position: absolute; font-size: 1px; line-height: 0; color: transparent; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .searchForm .search [class*="btn"]:before {  content: ''; position: absolute; background-image: url(//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/sfix_search_form.png);  background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: 150px 25px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .searchForm .search .btnDelete:before { right: 11px; top: 11px;  width: 12px;  height: 12px;  background-position: -100px 0; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .shopQShow .searchForm .search .btnDelete {  right: 35px; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .searchForm .search .btnResearch { width: 34px; height: 34px; border-left: 1px solid #d8d8d8;  font-size: 1px;line-height: 0; top: 1px;  right: 1px;  background: url(//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/sfix_search_form.png) 11px 11px no-repeat; background-size: 150px 25px; }
/* 상세검색 레이어 팝업(팝업형) */
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .xans-product-searchdata .searchCondition { display:none; z-index:301; overflow-y:auto; max-width:900px; margin: 0 auto;  position:fixed; top:0; left:0; right:0; bottom:0; background:#fff; -webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .xans-product-searchdata .searchCondition h2 { padding: 16px 50px 16px 16px; font-size: 15px; line-height: 18px; font-weight: bold; background: #fff; color: #000; }
.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .xans-product-searchdata .searchCondition .btnClose { display: inline-block; width: 50px; height: 50px; position: absolute;  right: 0; top: 0; z-index: 110; color: #000; font-size: 0; line-height: 0;  background: url('https://moma-img.echosting.cafe24.com/img/1/cb51/close_btn.png') 0 0 no-repeat;  background-size: 50px; }

        <form class="searchField" id="ec-product-fixed-form" action="/product/search.html" method="get">
            <div class="searchCondition shopQShow">
                <div class="toggleArea selected" module="product_FixedSearchFilterList">
                    <div class="title {$filter_key}">
                        <h3>{$filter_name}</h3>
                    </div>
                    <div class="contents {$filter_type}">
                        <ul module="product_filterform">
                            <li class="{$filter_class}">{$filter_value}</li>
                            <li class="{$filter_class}">{$filter_value}</li>
                        </ul>
                        <div class="withinInput {$within_input_display|display}">
                            <div class="search">{$within_input}<button type="button" class="btnDelete">삭제</button><button type="button" class="btnResearch">검색</button></div>
                            {$within_suggest}
                        </div>
                        <div class="priceInput {$price_input_display|display}">{$price_input}</div>
                        <div class="slider {$price_slider_display|display}">{$price_slider}</div>
                        <p class="value {$price_slider_display|display}">{$price_txt}</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>
        <div module="product_searchdata" id="ec-product-fixed-form-filter" class="searchCondition">
            <form class="searchCondition" id="{$searchdata_form}" name="" method="get">
                <input type="hidden" name="keyword" id="{$searchdata_keyword_hidden}" /><input type="hidden" name="rel_keyword" id="{$searchdata_rel_keyword}" value="{$searchdata_rel_keyword_param}" /><div class="header"><h2 class="title">상세검색</h2></div>
                <div class="wrap">
                    <div class="toggleArea eToggle selected" module="product_SearchFilterList">
                        <div class="title {$filter_key}">
                            <h3>{$filter_name}</h3>
                        </div>
                        <div class="contents {$filter_type}">
                            <ul module="product_filterform">
                                <li class="{$filter_class}">{$filter_value}</li>
                                <li class="{$filter_class}">{$filter_value}</li>
                            </ul>
                            <div class="withinInput {$within_input_display|display}">
                                <div class="search">{$within_input}<button type="button" class="btnDelete">삭제</button><button type="button" class="btnResearch">검색</button></div>
                                {$within_suggest}
                            </div>
                            <div class="priceInput {$price_input_display|display}">{$price_input}</div>
                            <div class="slider {$price_slider_display|display}">{$price_slider}</div>
                            <p class="value {$price_slider_display|display}">{$price_txt}</p>
                        </div>
                        <button type="button" class="btnClear ec-product-searchdata-form-clear"
                                {$filter_key_value}>선택해제</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="moreTags ec-base-button gFixed">
                    <div class="ec-base-button gColumn">
                        <button type="button" class="btnEm ec-product-searchdata-reset">초기화</button>
                        <button type="button" class="btnSubmit" id="{$searchdata_submit}"> {$total_count}건 결과보기</button><span id="ec-product-searchdata-search-count"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <button type="button" class="btnClose" id="ec-product-filter-close">닫기</button>
            </form>
        </div>
        <p class="moreTags"><button type="button" id="ec-product-searchdata-mobile-button" class="btnSearchdata {$search_detail_search_display|display}">필터 더보기</button></p>
        <div module="product_searchConditionData">
            <ul class="searchDataResult">
                <li> {$search_condition_data}<button type="button" class="btnSearchDelete" {$search_attr}>삭제</button>
                </li>
                <li> {$search_condition_data}<button type="button" class="btnSearchDelete" {$search_attr}>삭제</button>
                </li>
            </ul>
            <button type="button" class="btnRefresh ec-product-searchdata-reset">초기화</button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div module="product_normalpackage">
    <div module="product_listnormal" class="productList typeThumb">
        <!--
            $count = 12
                ※ 상품진열갯수를 설정하는 변수입니다. 설정하지 않을 경우, 최대 200개의 상품이 진열 됩니다.
                ※ 진열된 상품이 많으면, 쇼핑몰에 부하가 발생할 수 있습니다.
            $basket_result = /product/add_basket.html
            $basket_option = /product/basket_option.html
        -->
        <div module="product_normalmenu" class="sortingArea">
            <div class="sort">
                <select id="selArray" name="selArray" module="product_Orderby">
                    <option value="">-정렬방식-</option>
                    <option value="{$param}">{$sort_name}</option>
                    <option value="{$param}">{$sort_name}</option>
                </select>
            </div> 
            <div class="btnSorting eProductSort">
                <button type="button" class="bigView selected">확대보기</button>
                <button type="button" class="smallView">축소보기</button>
            </div>
        </div>

        <ul class="prdList">
            <li id="anchorBoxId_{$product_no}">
                <div class="inner">
                    <div class="thumbnail">
                        <div class="prdImg">
                            <a href="{$link_product_detail}" name="anchorBoxName_{$product_no}"><img src="{$image_medium}" id="{$image_medium_id}" alt="{$seo_alt_tag}" /><span module="product_Imagestyle"><span class="prdIcon {$icon_class_name}" style="background-image:url('{$icon_url}');"></span></span></a>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="description">
                        <strong class="name"><a href="{$link_product_detail}" class="{$product_name_display|display}"><span class="title {$product_name_title_display|display}">{$product_name_title} :</span> {$product_name}</a></strong>
                        <ul module="product_ListItem" class="spec">
                            <li class="{$item_display|display}"><strong class="title {$item_title_display|display}">{$item_title} :</strong> {$item_content}</li>
                            <li class="{$item_display|display}"><strong class="title {$item_title_display|display}">{$item_title} :</strong> {$item_content}</li>
                        </ul>
                        <span class="icon">{$soldout_icon}{$stock_icon}{$recommend_icon}{$new_icon}{$today_arrival_icon}{$pickup_icon}{$product_icons}{$benefit_icons}</span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li>
            <li id="anchorBoxId_{$product_no}">
                <div class="inner">
                    <div class="thumbnail">
                        <div class="prdImg">
                            <a href="{$link_product_detail}" name="anchorBoxName_{$product_no}"><img src="{$image_medium}" id="{$image_medium_id}" alt="{$seo_alt_tag}" /><span module="product_Imagestyle"><span class="prdIcon {$icon_class_name}" style="background-image:url('{$icon_url}');"></span></span></a>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="description">
                        <strong class="name"><a href="{$link_product_detail}" class="{$product_name_display|display}"><span class="title {$product_name_title_display|display}">{$product_name_title} :</span> {$product_name}</a></strong>
                        <ul module="product_ListItem" class="spec">
                            <li class="{$item_display|display}"><strong class="title {$item_title_display|display}">{$item_title} :</strong> {$item_content}</li>
                            <li class="{$item_display|display}"><strong class="title {$item_title_display|display}">{$item_title} :</strong> {$item_content}</li>
                        </ul>
                        <span class="icon">{$soldout_icon}{$stock_icon}{$recommend_icon}{$new_icon}{$today_arrival_icon}{$pickup_icon}{$product_icons}{$benefit_icons}</span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>
<div module="product_normalpaging" class="productPaginate typeList">
    <a href="{$param_before}" class="btnPrev">이전 페이지</a>
    <ol class="page">
        <li><a href="{$param}" class="{$param_class}">{$no}</a></li>
        <li><a href="{$param}" class="{$param_class}">{$no}</a></li>
        <li><a href="{$param}" class="{$param_class}">{$no}</a></li>
        <li><a href="{$param}" class="{$param_class}">{$no}</a></li>
        <li><a href="{$param}" class="{$param_class}">{$no}</a></li>
    </ol>
    <a href="{$param_next}" class="btnNext">다음 페이지</a>
</div>
<!-- //MOMA COMPONENT ID 37 -->
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
(function() {


    function pageLoaded() {
        // only skin
    }

    function dndComponent() {
        $('.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc .eProductSort button').click(function(){
            if ($(this).hasClass('selected')) {
 
            } else {
                $(this).addClass('selected');
                $(this).siblings('button').removeClass('selected');
                if ($(this).hasClass('selected')) {
                    $(this).parents('.xans-product-normalpackage').find('.xans-product-listnormal .prdList').toggleClass('small');
                }
            }
        });
        
        $('.dnd_module_cb512e5bb1ccf49be3df289bf203e4fc #shopQ').find('button.btnDelete').bind('click', function () {
            $(this).parent().find('input.keyword').attr('value', '').focus();
        });
    }

    if (document.readyState == 'complete') {
        dndComponent();
    } else {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', dndComponent);
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', pageLoaded);
    }

})();
</script>
</div>
